title: Traffik: The Stolen Girls
description: A story of modern day slavery. Four girls stolen from their homes and sold into a life of degradation and humiliation, four very different girls who learn to respect and rely on each other as they battle for survival against the odds and a cruel and powerful enemy.Follow spoiled and vain Jata, sensible and motherly Akinyi, sensitive but disturbed Shani and worldly Marija as they strive to regain their stolen freedom and dignity.
author: Andy  Lang
